thread.title: Tamron Hall officially out at NBC
thread.title_full: Tamron Hall officially out at NBC

author: Molly Eichel
title: Tamron Hall officially out at NBC
text:
Tamron Hall officially out at NBC Updated: February 1, 2017 — 5:03 PM EST 40 Share 


@TamronHall is leaving NBC News. Last week the network decided to cancel Tamron & 's 9am hour, making room for @MegynKelly 
Brian Stelter (@brianstelter) February 1, 2017 
@TamronHall -- but her NBC show had been cancelled & she felt disrespected https://t.co/ROPdSC5Gj2 
Brian Stelter (@brianstelter) February 1, 2017 
, when it was leaked that former Fox News anchor Megyn Kelly was taking over the 9 a.m. hour, but as CNN's Brian Stelter reports , it is not clear whether Kelly will take over the 9 a.m. hour or the 10 a.m. hour, currently hosted by Kathie Lee Gifford and Hoda Kotb. 
"The last 10 years have been beyond anything I could have imagined, and I'm grateful. I'm also very excited about the next chapter. To all my great colleagues, I will miss you and I will be rooting for you." 
filled the spot vacated by Bill Cosby . 
Deadline: Crime with Tamron Hall on Investigation Discovery. She was inspired to host the show after her sister's brutal 2004 murder .
